numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I wonder why the difference between players of color and coaches of color is so high.
2. This difference is high in both categories.
3. I know that there are more players of color than coaches of color.
4. In most cases, the difference is astounding.
5. The difference is most notable for coaches.
6. The time frame of these graphs is from 1 year ago or 2 years ago.
7. I wonder why the percentages are not calculated now.
